Song.title: I Want To Be Where You Are
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Stephen Altrogge © 2008 Sovereign Grace Praise
Song.amazon_links: [{"asin":"B001EUQESM","title":"I Want to Be Where You Are","artist":"Sovereign Grace Music","image_url":"http:\/\/ecx.images-amazon.com\/images\/I\/51UvWo97kuL._SL75_.jpg"}]

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [||: A | F#m7 | Dmaj7 | Dmaj7 :||]
Verse 1: How [A]sweet the [Bm7sus]place{,} where [A/C#]You dwell, O [D2]Lord My [A]soul [Bm7sus]longs and faints for [F#m7 | Dmaj7]You My [A]heart sings [Bm7sus]out a [A/C#]loud song of [D2]joy For [A2]I have [Bm7sus]known the living [F#m7 | E]God
Chorus: [A]I want to be where [Asus]You [A]are, [ E]O [ ]Lord [| Esus E] [F#m]I want to be where [D]You [F#m]are, [ Esus]O Lord [E] I’d rather have [F#m7]just one [C#m]day with [Bm]You [Bm] Than be anywhere [A | F#m7 | A/D | A/D]else
Verse 2: There’s [A]no good [Bm7sus]thing{,} that [A/C#]You will with[D2]hold From [A]those who [Bm7sus]live to follow [F#m7]You I’d [A]rather [Bm7sus]be Your [A/C#]servant, O [D2]God Than [A2]have the [Bm7sus]riches of this [F#m7 | E]world
Bridge: [C#m]Those who follow [D]You{,} go from [A]strength to [E]strength [C#m]Those who follow [D]You{,} are filled with [A | A]joy [C#m]Those who follow [D]You{,} go from [A]strength to [E]strength [C#m]Those who follow [D]You{,} are filled with [Esus | Esus]joy
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 how sweet the place where you dwell o lord my soul longs and faints for you my heart sings out a loud song of joy for i have known the living god chorus i want to be where you are o lord i want to be where you are o lord id rather have just one day with you than be anywhere else verse 2 theres no good thing that you will withhold from those who live to follow you id rather be your servant o god than have the riches of this world bridge those who follow you go from strength to strength those who follow you are filled with joy those who follow you go from strength to strength those who follow you are filled with joy
